name: Spook In The Dark
description:
Help Carly scare her younger brother, Tobias by creating a path of shadow! Click and drag the furniture in the house to block out the light and obscure her in shadow.

“We’ll be back by 9:00. We’ve left some pizza money with the babysitter, just let her know when you’re hungry. And remember you two… BEHAVE YOURSELVES!”

Carly was most certainly not going to behave herself. In the last few months, 13-year-old Carly had developed a habit of pranking her 8-year-old brother, Tobias. In fact, she had been grounded quite a few times for her antics. Hiding behind the furniture and jumping out at him when he least expected it was her “modus operandi” so to say.

Her parents going on a date night (a rare occurrence!) And leaving her and her brother with the world's laziest babysitter (she really was only there for the fifty dollars and free pizza) gave her the perfect opportunity to pull off the ultimate scares on poor Toby.

Can she pull it off? Will she be able to sufficiently hide from her brother?
